instructions: I shall read to you a number of characteristics that belong to a particular person. Please listen to them carefully and try to form an impression of the kind of person described. You will later be asked to give a brief characterization of the person in just a few sentences. I will read the list slowly and will repeat it once. After forming your impression, please complete the following task.

items.question: Rank the terms of the list in order of their importance for determining your impression. Which term was of the lowest importance?
